message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you, and this is a fair starting point for negotiation.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $8,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $8,000 is significantly below its true value.  How about we meet in the middle at $12,000?

I appreciate your response, Alice. While I respect the value you place on the product, I am unable to meet at $12,000. My maximum budget remains at $8,000. I would like to continue negotiating if possible.
